title: Fix tournament loading to populate data on tournament page

requirements.text: Fix the tournament loading functionality in TournamentListDialog so that when a user loads a saved tournament from the Manage Tournament dialog, the tournament data (name, teams, groups, stages, advancement configurations) properly populates on the tournament setup page instead of staying on an empty/existing tournament page

quotes: existing tournament page shown not opening daved tournament
get a 'tournament loaded' success message, but the tournament data isn't actually populating on the tournament page

acceptanceCriteria: When loading a saved tournament from the Manage Tournament dialog, all tournament data (name, teams, groups, stages) populates on the tournament setup page
The tournament setup page displays the loaded tournament data in an editable state
The 'tournament loaded' success message appears only when the data is successfully populated
All tournament configuration fields reflect the loaded tournament's saved state

constraints: Do not modify the backend tournament data structure or storage logic
Maintain the existing deserialization logic in frontend/src/features/tournament/deserialization.ts
Preserve the current tournament store state management patterns in useTournamentStore.ts
nonGoals: Changing the Manage Tournament dialog UI layout
Adding new tournament fields or data structures
